org.tomleese.platinum.widget

Class DiagonalButtons

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • org.tomleese.platinum.widget.DiagonalButtons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class DiagonalButtons
extends android.view.View
    A button view that provides two triangles side by side.
    Author:
    Tom Leese
